vaccumed_cats.example_string: Cat flicks its tail (either the whole thing or just the tip)

operational_definitions.label: Tail Flicking
operational_definitions.description: Cat flicks it's fail, either the entire thing or just the tip.

operational_definitions.label: Paw Licking
operational_definitions.description: Cat licks paws or rubs them against face.

elephants.example_string: Elephant splashes or sprays water with trunk

operational_definitions.label: Trunk Spraying
operational_definitions.description: Elephant squirts water or sprays mist from its trunk.

operational_definitions.label: Diving
operational_definitions.description: Elephant partially or completely submerges itself.

birds.string: Several large birds in a yard
birds.example_string: Bird starts and stops with a regular frequency to crane neck

operational_definitions.label: Head Bobbing
operational_definitions.description: The bird moves head forward and back

operational_definitions.label: Pacing
operational_definitions.description: The bird walks in one direction, stops, switches directions to walk

operational_definitions.label: Wing Flapping
operational_definitions.description: One of the birds raises its wings and flaps them several times

cat_pair.string: Interactions between a pair of cats
cat_pair.example_string: Grey cat sniffs where black cat has just looked.

operational_definitions.label: Playing
operational_definitions.description: The grey cat bats at the black and white cat with its front or back paws

operational_definitions.label: Exploring
operational_definitions.description: The grey cat tries to open cupboard with its paw

operational_definitions.label: Tail Flick
operational_definitions.description: The black and white cat moves its tail back and forth

operational_definitions.label: Grooming
operational_definitions.description: The black and white cat licks its paws or the grey cat

cats.string: One cat interacting with its environment
cats.example_string: Cat paws at the floor slightly while smelling the air.

operational_definitions.label: Tail Flick
operational_definitions.description: The cat moves its tail back and forth

operational_definitions.label: Exploring
operational_definitions.description: The cat paws at the cupboard in an attempt to open it

operational_definitions.label: Jumping
operational_definitions.description: The cat jumps on counter and gets pushed off

operational_definitions.label: Affection
operational_definitions.description: The cat rubs body against person's leg

operational_definitions.label: Attacking
operational_definitions.description: The cat bites string on journal

operational_definitions.label: Grooming
operational_definitions.description: The cat licks person's head

operational_definitions.label: Avoidance
operational_definitions.description: The person shifts away from cat

dogs.string: A dog playing in the snow
dogs.example_string: Not a lot of repetitive/easily measured behaviour

operational_definitions.label: Sniffing
operational_definitions.description: The dog puts nose down to snow to smell

operational_definitions.label: Questioning
operational_definitions.description: The dog looks back at owner/camera

operational_definitions.label: Exploring
operational_definitions.description: The dog turns head while standing still

operational_definitions.label: Tracking
operational_definitions.description: The dog hanges direction of movement while sniffing the ground

operational_definitions.label: Swim
operational_definitions.description: The fish flaps its side fins

operational_definitions.label: Exploring
operational_definitions.description: The fish changes direction of swimming

goats.string: Goat eating hay in a barn
goats.example_string: Fairly continuous behaviour, so might be tricky to measure using tallys

operational_definitions.label: Feeding
operational_definitions.description: Goat shifts head to a new location in order to feed on hay

operational_definitions.label: Pawing
operational_definitions.description: Goat paws at hay in order to facilitate feeding

operational_definitions.label: Measuring
operational_definitions.description: Student pours an exact amount of ingredient into a measuring cup

operational_definitions.label: Pouring
operational_definitions.description: Student pours ingredient from measuring cup into bowl

operational_definitions.label: Stirring
operational_definitions.description: Student mixes ingredients in the bowl together using a spoon; one rotation around the bowl

operational_definitions.label: Chopping
operational_definitions.description: Student cuts vegetable

operational_definitions.label: Note taking
operational_definitions.description: Student writes a chunk of text in her notebook before looking up

operational_definitions.label: Studying
operational_definitions.description: Student looks up at her computer screen

operational_definitions.label: Scrolling
operational_definitions.description: Student scrolls down page on computer

operational_definitions.label: Drinking
operational_definitions.description: Student takes a sip of water

operational_definitions.label: Reading Label
operational_definitions.description: Student takes a product off the shelf and looks at the package before putting it in cart or on shelf

operational_definitions.label: Product Comparing
operational_definitions.description: Student picks up two products and alternates looking at packaging

operational_definitions.label: Reading Price
operational_definitions.description: Student indicates she is reading a yellow label on the shelf

operational_definitions.label: Catching
operational_definitions.description: Student on right catches product thrown to her by student on left

operational_definitions.label: Demonstrating
operational_definitions.description: One student points out a product on the shelf to the other student
